headline: IQVIA Expands AI Data Partnerships As Investors Weigh Growth Prospects
summary: IQVIA Holdings (NYSE:IQV) is expanding its AI driven clinical research solutions and signing new commercial collaborations tied to advanced data services. The company has entered a long term partnership with Boehringer Ingelheim to use its Data as a Service platform for global data harmonization and commercial analytics. IQVIA is also working with Amazon Web Services on cloud based capabilities and integrating new acquisitions to deepen its oncology and Phase I trial offering. IQVIA...
